Title: Bequest Statement with Erased Seals
Medium: ink and pigments on gold-sprinkled paper and tan tinted paper
Description: This folio from Walters manuscript W.578 includes a bequest (waqf) statement in the name of Sultan 'Uthman Khan III (reigned 1168-1171 AH/AD 1754-1757) that is signed by Ibrahim Hanif, inspector of awqaf. Seals, apparently of the Sultan and the inspector, are erased.
Keywords: Arabic; Binding; Book; Calligraphy; Codex; Illumination; Islamic; Manuscript; Ottoman; Prayer; Turkey
Provenance: Sultan 'Uthman Khan III, son of Mustafa II (reigned 1168-1171 AH/AD 1754-1757) [date and mode of acquisition unknown] [waqf entry in the name of the Sultan signed by Ibrahim Hanif, inspector of awqaf on fol. 2a and seals of the Sultan and the inspector erased]; Henry Walters, Baltimore [date and mode of acquisition unknown]; Walters Art Museum, 1931, by bequest.
Creator: Abu al-Hasan al-Shadhili (died 656 AH/AD 1258)
